title: Chicken Noodle Soup
directions: Cut the chicken breasts into 2cm cubes.
Dissolve the stock cubes in 900ml of water and bring to the boil in a large sauce pan with the soy sauce, garlic and chilli.
Add the chicken breast and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the red pepper, cabbage, sweetcorn and noodles.
Bring back to the boil and boil for 3-4 minutes then serve in large bowls.
ingredients: ¼ to ½ red chilli, finely diced
½ red pepper, deseeded and sliced
